statements: SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result = 'Negative';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT test_name, patient_id FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date > '2022-06-01' AND test_result = 'Negative';
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, result FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT test_id, test_name, result FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, conclusion FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE procedure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_procedures ORDER BY patient_id ASC, procedure_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC, result ASC
SELECT test_name, result FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_date, conclusion FROM diagnostic_procedures ORDER BY procedure_date ASC
SELECT test_name, test_date, result FROM lab_tests WHERE result > 50
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005'
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE patient_id = 200 ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_result FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE patient_id = 300 AND procedure_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_result FROM diagnostic_procedures WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY procedure_date ASC;
SELECT decision_text, decision_date FROM medical_decisions WHERE patient_id = 200 AND doctor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_id=3;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id=1;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT t.test_name, t.test_result, p.patient_name FROM LabTests t JOIN Patients p ON t.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT d.doctor_name, d.specialization, a.appointment_date FROM Doctors d JOIN Appointments a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, d.doctor_name, a.appointment_date FROM Appointments a JOIN Patients p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id ORDER BY a.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT test_name, cost FROM lab_tests WHERE cost > 100.00 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, notes, doctor_id, patient_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date < '2022-12-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY dob DESC
SELECT name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01' AND dob <= '1995-12-31'
SELECT name, gender, address FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5)

SELECT patients.name, doctors.name AS doctor_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id

SELECT patients.name AS patient_name, lab_tests.test_name, test_results.result, test_results.date_performed FROM patients INNER JOIN test_results ON patients.patient_id = test_results.patient_id INNER JOIN lab_tests ON test_results.test_id = lab_tests.test_id ORDER BY test_results.date_performed ASC
